Cinematic Navigation / Gaussian Splats

Scene Preview

These .ply files use the SuperSplat packed layout. Convert them first with npm run convert -- input-data/<scene>.ply public/<scene>.ply -w.

Waiting to load a scene...

Orbit: mouse drag. Move: W/A/S/D + Q/E (down/up). Speed: hold Shift. Waypoints: 1 mark start, 2 mark end, P log pose, F replay precomputed path.

Canvas-only capture (no UI). Hotkeys: Shift+R / Shift+S. Outputs MP4 when supported, otherwise WebM.
